name: The Climb (itch) (GibsS)
description:
The flood is coming and you need to lead your herd of cats to the top of the mountain! 

The Climb is a casual game where you indirectly control your climbers by telling them what to mine and where to place ladders. But the more time advances, the faster the flood moves and the crazier things get. 

It's a short game with a lot of replay value (runs are between 1 and 5 minutes). Any feedback is extremely appreciated.
